alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 2:11PM CST until December 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Dundy County. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The strong winds will lead to limited visibility in the falling snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard like conditions may occur for western Dundy County.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
